parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per trial summary parameter value

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TS.STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TS.DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TS.TSSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness within a dataset. Allows inclusion of multiple records for the same TSPARMCD.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: TSSEQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TS.TSGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Used to tie together a group of related records.
datasetVariables.label: Group ID
datasetVariables.name: TSGRPID

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66738

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TS.TSPARMCD

datasetVariables.description: TSPARMCD (the companion to TSPARM) is limited to 8 characters and does not have special character restrictions. These values should be short for ease of use in programming, but it is not expected that TSPARMCD will need to serve as variable names. Examples: "AGEMIN", "AGEMAX".
datasetVariables.label: Trial Summary Parameter Short Name
datasetVariables.name: TSPARMCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C67152

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TS.TSPARM

datasetVariables.description: Term for the Trial Summary Parameter. The value in TSPARM cannot be longer than 40 characters. Examples: "Planned Minimum Age of Subjects", "Planned Maximum Age of Subjects".
datasetVariables.label: Trial Summary Parameter
datasetVariables.name: TSPARM

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TS.TSVAL

datasetVariables.description: Value of TSPARM. Example: "ASTHMA" when TSPARM value is "Trial Indication". TSVAL can only be null when TSVALNF is populated. Text over 200 characters can be added to additional columns TSVAL1-TSVALn. See Assumption 8.
datasetVariables.label: Parameter Value
datasetVariables.name: TSVAL

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TS.TSVALNF

datasetVariables.description: Null flavor for the value of TSPARM, to be populated if and only if TSVAL is null.
datasetVariables.label: Parameter Null Flavor
datasetVariables.name: TSVALNF

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TS.TSVALCD

datasetVariables.description: This is the code of the term in TSVAL. For example, "6CW7F3G59X" is the code for Gabapentin; "C49488" is the code for Y. The length of this variable can be longer than 8 to accommodate the length of the external terminology.
datasetVariables.label: Parameter Value Code
datasetVariables.name: TSVALCD

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TS.TSVCDREF

datasetVariables.description: The name of the Reference Terminology from which TSVALCD is taken. For example; CDISC, SNOMED, ISO 8601.
datasetVariables.label: Name of the Reference Terminology
datasetVariables.name: TSVCDREF

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TS.TSVCDVER

datasetVariables.description: The version number of the Reference Terminology, if applicable.
datasetVariables.label: Version of the Reference Terminology
datasetVariables.name: TSVCDVER

description: A trial design domain that contains one record for each trial summary characteristic. This domain is not subject oriented. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C53483, 2018-06-29)
label: Trial Summary Information
name: TS
